title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.2 - Types of goods purchased; areas of responsibility and oversight requiring use of personal services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.2 - Types of goods purchased; areas of responsibility and oversight requiring use of personal services

State Regulations

The corporation's functions and responsibilities and its
customary methods of operations generally call for: (a) the procurement of goods of the following
types: hotel equipment, supplies and inventories, including food and beverage
items; building equipment, supplies and inventories; and construction
materials; and
(b) the procurement
of personal services with respect to architecture and design, hotel management
and operations, property management and operations, investment management, legal, accounting, construction, construction management, repair and cleaning. The president may from time to time determine that the provision of personal
services is appropriate in other areas of the corporation's
operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2054.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
